place.name: HENFYNYW
place.gazetteerText: HENFYNYW, a parish in Aberayron district, Cardigan; on the coast, at the month of the river Ayron. It contains part of the town of Aberayron: which see. Acres, 2, 261; of which 120 are water. Real property, £1, 732. Pop., 1, 067. Houses, 254. The property is divided among a few. The living is a vicarage in the diocese of St. Davids. Value, £115. Patron, the Bishop of St. Davids. The church is indiffferent. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
